Key Match Events: Andrew Benintendi hit a walk-off RBI single in the tenth inning.
Korey Lee hit a two-run homer in the second inning.
Lenyn Sosa hit a tiebreaking solo drive in the fourth inning.
Michael Stefanic laid down a bunt single on a squeeze play to tie the game at three.
The Angels matched a franchise record with their 95th loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A sparse crowd voiced their displeasure with chairman Jerry Reinsdorf, chanting 'Sell the team!' and 'Jerry sucks!'
The White Sox avoided a record-breaking 121st loss for the second straight game.
The Angels' 95th loss matched a franchise record shared by the 1968 and 1980 teams.
The White Sox tied the modern major league record for losses in a season with the 1962 New York Mets.
Others: Angels' 1B Nolan Schanuel exited in the first inning due to a bruised right leg.
The White Sox opted to push ace Garrett Crochet's start back a day to Friday.
RHP Chris Flexen will start for the White Sox in the home finale, while LHP Tyler Anderson will start for the Angels.
